name: Inspector Waffles
summary: Murder. Nothin’ nice about it. In this old school detective adventure, step into the boots of whip-smart Inspector Waffles and travel the city to track hidden clues, interrogate shady suspects, and unravel a dangerous mystery. But be warned: curiosity killed the cat...
info:
• 中文名: 华夫饼检查员
  • 平台: PC
